entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon.
